Name: Potato Thriller
About the game: After receiving an anonymous tip about the whereabouts of the Potato Man, bounty hunting team Quindalin and Dexter depart on a mission to put an end to the Potato Man once and for all. You'll get to... Laugh. Cry. Fall in love. Talk to a hot dog. Get deep-fried.
